originalText.text: I took my daughter to Dr. Nino this past week and found Dr. Nino to be incredibly compassionate, thorough and interested in my daughter‚Äôs health history and current conditions. My daughter and I felt very heard and seen and were not at all rushed. Dr. Nino had labs taken right after our appt and she has already agreed to confer with our daughter‚Äôs immunologist. We are also now having our daughter be a patient of Dr. Nino‚Äôs colleague Dr. Siefferman, whom we also met with and like very much. We feel grateful to have a pain medicine physician and a rheumatologist in the same practice that can also confer and know my daughter‚Äôs immunologist. The staff in Drs Nino‚Äôs and Siefferman‚Äôs office are lovely and a pleasure to speak with and coordinate appts with. We feel very fortunate to have been recommended to Dr. Nino (and Dr. Siefferman) and are only too happy to share these sentiments on this platform. I have no doubt our daughter will a patient of Dr. Nino‚Äôs and Dr. Siefferman‚Äôs for many years to come and that gives my husband and me great comfort.

originalText.text: It has been about three years since I came to Dr. Nino‚Äôs office. I had many joint pains plus some psoriasis breakout. originalText.text: Dr Nino Mikaberidze is experienced rheumatology physician. She is very compassionate and thorough. She takes time and evaluates each patient individually and sets goal and plan to achieve best possible outcome for her patients. She maintains highest standard of patient care and is excellent source for second opinion . She goes above and beyond to deliver superior care for her patients.
